items.content_html: Overide (pronounced over·ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.
items.title: oi-overide/oi: Overide (pronounced over·ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.

items.title: varletjs/rattail: A utilities library for front-end developers, lightweight and ts-friendly

items.content_html: Lightweight utility for converting Markdown into valid React-email templates. This tool simplifies the process of creating responsive and customisable email templates by leveraging the power of React and Markdown.
items.title: codeskills-dev/md-to-react-email: Lightweight utility for converting Markdown into valid React-email templates. This tool simplifies the process of creating responsive and customisable email templates by leveraging the power of React and Markdown.

items.content_html: EZ-Shop API is a lightweight, testing-focused platform. It allows easy API key generation, product browsing, searching, posting, and rating—all without sign-up. Perfect for experimenting with basic eCommerce functionality.
items.title: Ismedom/ShopEasy-API: EZ-Shop API is a lightweight, testing-focused platform. It allows easy API key generation, product browsing, searching, posting, and rating—all without sign-up. Perfect for experimenting with basic eCommerce functionality.

items.content_html: Stateflow-lib is a lightweight React library for centralized global state management using the React Context API. It allows seamless state sharing across components without prop drilling, with custom hooks for accessing and updating the state. Fully TypeScript-supported for type safety and scalability.
items.title: youngsavage-codes/stateflow-lib: Stateflow-lib is a lightweight React library for centralized global state management using the React Context API. It allows seamless state sharing across components without prop drilling, with custom hooks for accessing and updating the state. Fully TypeScript-supported for type safety and scalability.

items.content_html: React-Scroll is a lightweight library for enhancing scrolling functionality in React applications. Whether you're building a single-page application, a portfolio site, or a complex web application, React Scroll provides you with an easy-to-use solution for implementing smooth scrolling behavior.
items.title: sdmcoder/Rect-scroll: React-Scroll is a lightweight library for enhancing scrolling functionality in React applications. Whether you're building a single-page application, a portfolio site, or a complex web application, React Scroll provides you with an easy-to-use solution for implementing smooth scrolling behavior.
